product_overview: International Affairs ERP is a comprehensive web application designed for Dayananda Sagar University's International Affairs department to manage partnerships, events, exchanges, and workflows centrally with role-based access and extensive reporting capabilities.
core_goals: Centralize data management for all international affairs activities
Streamline administrative workflows with approval processes
Enable dynamic and comprehensive report generation
Maintain detailed records of partners, MoUs, campus visits, and programs
Support bulk data import/export and integration with Google Forms
key_features: Robust JWT-based authentication with admin approval and role management
Dashboard with real-time statistics and visualizations for all modules
13 standardized data management modules including Partners, Events, Scholars, and more
Approval workflow enabling non-admins to request edits/deletions with admin oversight
Advanced report generation supporting PDF/DOCX exports with dynamic filters
Bulk CSV import/export and Excel data import scripts
Admin user management interface for controlling roles and registrations
Responsive UI with theme switcher supporting 32 DaisyUI themes
Reusable components like modals, pagination, filter bars, and protected routes
user_flow_summary: Users log in or register and await admin approval before accessing features
Admins manage users, approve registrations, and oversee pending actions
Users navigate modules to create, edit, view, or delete records with status-based approval workflows
Deletion requests from non-admins require reasons and admin approval before final action
Users generate filtered reports selecting modules, date ranges, and formats â€” then download PDF or DOCX files
Users upload CSV files for bulk data import with preview and validation
Admin reviews pending edit/delete requests and approves or rejects them accordingly
validation_criteria: Authentication enforces correct login, token persistence, and role-based access
Dashboard metrics and charts load within 3 seconds and display accurate data
All 13 modules support full CRUD with validations, filtering, pagination, and correct UI feedback
Detail modals display all record fields clearly and dates are human-readable
Reports generate correctly filtered PDF/DOCX files with dynamic filters and quick date selections
Import/export features handle valid CSV/Excel files robustly, showing success or error messages
Approval workflows function as expected with pending requests visible to users and admins
User management accessible only to admins with validation for uniqueness and password strength
Performance targets met: page load under 3 seconds, minimized HTTP requests, and no console errors
UI is fully responsive and accessible across mobile, tablet, and desktop
